Summary: Search through tags too

Initial Comment:
The integrated search doesn't search through the tags 
of the cliparts. Because of that, the search results 
are quite poor.

At www.openclipart.org/cchost for example, most of the 
clipart have a very short description, or no 
descriptiopn at all, and because of that the user gets 
1 to 3 relevant results, instead of 8 to 10.

Please make it search among tags, and not only in the 
name and description of cliparts, this will increase 
the search accuracy and wideness.

Thanks!
